BR_text.BRsummary: runtests.sh does not find integration tests
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 runtests.sh does not find integration tests.
 To Reproduce
 ./runtests.sh --net --dryrun
 Expected behavior
 It should find and run each individual test files whose name contains "integration" in the tests/ folder.
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3968947/98990810-f7a1d680-24f8-11eb-9ffa-940108c18bf1.png></denchmark-link>
